item.description:
Tom L. is hosting this event

Join fellow Sitz members & guests for our fourth annual Chinese Dinner at the Asia Garden Restaurant (617-695-1646). Almost all other customers in this special restaurant will be Chinese. The cost of this family style meal is VERY reasonable and there is an ample amount of food. The restaurant is cozy so we can only accommodate about a dozen members total. We will all share the cost of the meal but members should purchase drinks separately!

It is difficult to find parking, so it is best to use the Orange line. Simply get off at Chinatown and walk 2 blocks to Harrison Avenue. Please call Tom Litrenta (781-665-5920) if you plan to attend.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Tom, he will be one of the few caucasians
item.name: Dinner in Chinatown
